### NPP-S4486038: One (1) Special Advisor Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Reference Number:** cb-6236-3438349

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Industry:** Temporary Personnel Services (UNSPSC Code: 80111600)

**Description:**
The National Defence Department seeks one (1) Special Advisor Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). 

**Security Clearance:** Top Secret level is required. The contractor shall provide the required Security Clearance by means of a clearance card ( نوك , card registered at the Certificate File Department (DPC) or it could be argued that the clearance with another title management hence an optional but planned content section will have an access for follow instructions at optimal periods 



**Tendering Advisor:** This requirement is exclusive to Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under EN578-172870. Suppliers who have met the requirements under stream 13.9 – Special Advisor. 

**Deadline:**
The Tender Closing Date is 14:00 (Local Time) on 2023-06-13.

**Required Documents:**
To obtain information for this tender, [visit this link][1]

**Project Overview:**
Ministère de la Défense Nationale requires temporary help services for the Department of National Defence.

**Contractor Information:** For more information on how to apply, please call or email CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at 613-971-795 or CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca.

[1]: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6236/s4486038--rfp-english_2.pdf

[2]: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6236/s4486038--rfp-%28french.%29.pdf
